title: Drawing, "International Casino: First Mezzanine", 1937
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
markings: Architect's stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY; see inscription
inscribed: Architect's stamp inscribed in graphite: 546-61; 1/4"-1'-0"; INT. CASINO; SAENGER / 4/20/37 / 4/20/37 / 5/20/37 / 6/15/37; 4/20/37, 2, BRECKER / 4/ 20/37, 1, LAMB / 4/20/37, 2, BRECKER / 4/20/37, 1, LAMB / 6/15/37, 1, BRECKER / 6/15/37, 2, WEISS / 6/16/37, 5, BRECKER / 9/9/37, 1, OFFICE. Inscribed in graphite at lower center: FIRST MEZZANINE [underlined]. Inscribed in graphite throughout with descriptions and dimensions.
description: Floor plan of first mezzanine, International Casino, New York City. Center spiral staircase/bar at center, stairs on upper and lower sides. Long bench on right wall, with row of white tables in front, facing bar/staircase. Uplighting behind bench. Escalator on upper wall.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "International Casino: First Mezzanine", 1937.
1937. Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-265.
